text: Renée Pietrafesa Bonnet (17 December 1938 – 3 February 2022) was a French- Uruguayan composer, pianist, organist, harpsichordist and conductor. Her music was often Electroacoustic music. Bonnet was born in Montevideo, Uruguay to French parents. Bonnet died on 3 February 2022 in Montevideo at the age of 83.A los 83 años falleció la compositora y pianista Renée Pietrafesa, ladiaria.com.uy; accessed 4 February 2022. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French pianists Category:French conductors Category:Musicians from Montevideo Category:Uruguayan composers
title: Renée Pietrafesa Bonnet
